vclaim: A southern California man found shrimp tails, a string, and rat feces in a box of Cinnamon Toast Crunch cereal.
title: Did California Man Find Shrimp Tails in His Cereal Box?
subtitle: The same person also shared photos that appeared to show various other contaminants in the same box of Cinnamon Toast Crunch.
author: Madison Dapcevich
